title: Modern Apartment
description: Spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment in the heart of Melbourne with access to all major transport links and stunning city views.

title: Cozy Home
description: A charming and affordable 3-bedroom house ideal for a small family, located in a quiet Geelong neighborhood.

title: Luxury Villa
description: A high-end villa with 5 bedrooms, a private pool, and a large garden. Perfect for luxurious family living in Brighton.

title: Beachside Bungalow
description: Enjoy ocean views every morning from this 2-bedroom bungalow situated steps from the beach.

title: Suburban Retreat
description: Modern 4-bedroom home with a double garage and backyard. Located near schools and parks in Doncaster.
